title: My Lord Conqueror
description: MY BELOVED PRISONERThe wild and tempestuous peasant daughter of a slain Saxon lord, Alana of Brynwald bravely resists the brutal Norman invaders — but fears the mysterious specter who haunts her dreams. And now he stands before her — tall and strong as an oak ... terrifying yet strangely exciting. The dark knight of her visions has come to claim her as his prize.MY LORD CONQUERORBy rights, Merrick of Normandy should shun the serpent-tongued beauty who wishes him dead. But Alana's sensuous fire draws him to her — and burns him to his warrior soul. It is he who is lord and she the captive. Yet Merrick can never claim true victory until the proud Saxon maid shares his passion — and embraces him as master of her heart
author: Samantha James
